actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a community action opioid response grant program.
short_title: Community Action Opioid Response Act of 2018

summary.text:
Community Action Opioid Response Act of 2018

This bill requires the Office of Community Services within the Department of Health and Human Services to establish a grant program that helps low-income individuals, families, and communities affected by the national opioid epidemic. Grants must be awarded to Community Action Agencies (local organizations that work to reduce poverty in low-income communities) for specified activities relating to opioid misuse and abuse, including education, outreach, prevention, and treatment services.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a community action opioid response grant program.
